frameDefinitions: A Defender responds to an Assailant's attack on a Victim by directly, and usually violently, countering it.
Words in this frame name medical conditions or diseases that a patient suffers from, is being treated for, may be cured of, or die of.
A Theme has access to a Useful_location or is blocked from it by a Barrier. '' 'Making services accessible to those with special needs is expensive.'
In this frame either a Stimulus brings about a particular emotion or experience in the Experiencer or  saliently fails to bring about a particular experience.
This frame contains words which name permanent fixed structures forming an enclosure and providing protection from the elements.
A Fire burns Fuel, resulting in damage and possibly complete destruction of the Fuel.
frameExamples: Samantha stalwartly <t>defended</t> the gateway from the wraiths, crouching low over Stephen's prone form.
Making services <t>accessible</t> to those with special needs is expensive.
The baroque <t>church</t>, built in 1635, has a very rich interior
A fire that started on Saturday afternoon, the High Glade Fire - located on the Mendocino National Forest's Upper Lake Ranger District - continued to <t>burn</t> actively on Sunday.
listRoleDefinitions: This role is the being or entity that responds forcefully to the <fen>Assailant</fen>'s attack.
The person (or other self-directed entity) that is attempting physical harm to the <fen>Victim</fen>.
The individual or entity that is under attack from the <fen>Assailant</fen> .
This role identifies the time when the Defender takes forceful action against the Assailant.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Defender</fen> defends the <fen>Victim</fen> from the <fen>Assailant</fen>.
This role is used for the patient, entity, or population (originally) affected by the condition or illness.
The location where the <fen>Ailment</fen> is effecting the <fen>Patient</fen>s.
The <fen>Theme</fen> whose motion is blocked or free.
The place or thing that the <fen>Theme</fen> is headed towards, despite a potential or actual <fen>Barrier</fen>.
An entity, event, or state that (at least potentially) prevents the <fen>Theme</fen> from getting to the <fen>Useful_location</fen>.
The <fen>Stimulus</fen> is the object or event which brings about the emotion in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.
The entity built by the <fen>Builder</fen> which has some <fen>Function</fen>.

The total material currently involved in combustion, including both the parts of the <fen>Fuel</fen> currently undergoing chemical alteration and the partially ionized gas that results from this process.
The entity that is undergoing rapid chemical alteration leading to damage or destruction.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Fire</fen> is burning.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Fire</fen> is burning.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: up to a week or more
up to a week or more
University of Washington School of Medicine
